name: Seafarer (itch)
description:
You are a fearless seafarer, whose duty is to collect all floating supply crates from the waters, but be careful not to get ambushed by the fierce naval mines!

CONTROLS
WASD to Move
Mouse-1 to Shoot
Esc to Pause

NOTE!
Prepare to face the following issues with the current build:

  • Issue with menus:
    Main Menu button on "You Win" screen doesn't function (you can return to Main Menu by dying and getting there through "You Died" view, or by opening the Pause Menu with Esc.
    Some gameplay menus don't currently stop the game from rolling, which might cause issues.
  • Issue with crate calculation:
    If player restarts a level without collecting all crates, the calculation messes up and player can no longer finish the game. Only way to get the "You Win" screen is to close and restart the game.

CREDITS
